(6'2, 265 lbs, ordered XX-Large)  I have been absolutely delighted that many popular 90s fashions are back on trend, and none more so than comically baggy jeans. Problem is finding some that don't cost $100+. Thank goodness for low cost overseas manufacturing. Since they didn't provide normal pant sizes, I was a little worried about these. They fit fine. Very nearly too well, since at some angles you can barely tell they are supposed to be extra baggy, but those are typical big guy problems.  They're also comfortable, though the denim is concerningly thin. Definitely not for hard use. Unfortunately, they don't have giant back pockets like my old Jncos did. They also reeked of chemicals when they arrived, and I ended up washing them twice before that got to tolerable levels.  Still, I can't be mad because of how awesome they were, and because of how cheap they were compared to actual brands. I'll rock these proudly until they disintegrate.

评论概述: These are fine - not great, not bad.
评论详情: This are comfy, baggy, and soft. Happy with them in that regard. The biggest negative is that the waist seems to run pretty small. I've been ordering the same size waist pants for 20 years, and these are by far the smallest in the waist I've ever tried. Still fit, but not very comfortable in that regard. That's fine, I need to drop some lbs anyways, just be aware it seems like the waist runs pretty small compared to other brands.  The denim material is pretty light weight as well which has pros and cons. Pros being it is comfy and light weight. Cons being that it just feels like one of those pairs of pants that will wear out sooner than later.

I needed new jeans for the fall and came across these. They fit nicely and the quality is good. It has the standard 5 pockets and comfort and style look great. They seem to be able to with stand thing as far as durability goes. I would recommend these if you want baggy jeans, they do come under my feet as far as length, which I hope with sneakers, they don't get caught and rip.
Comfortable and lightweight

评论概述: More baggy than expected, but good quality
评论详情: It was my mistake to under estimate the true "wide leg" that this pant has. While i can't knock any stars off for my own misunderstanding, as a word of warning, these are not simply a baggy style jeans! They are almost parachute pants. I normally wear size 6 women's, I am 150lbs and 5'3. I ordered size Small, and they do fit very well. The leg is around an inch too long, but i like the rolled up look.  With a pair of chunky shoes and a tight top you've got yourself a Y2K dream outfit!

I am currently wearing this pair of pants. They are comfortable and slightly baggy, with a range of pockets for storing a variety of items.  Along with the standard hip pockets and rear flap pockets, the pants also have a pair of slit pockets that sit in front of the hip slots. Additionally, a pair of Velcro-shut pockets are set on the outer thighs. This gives eight options for storing keys, wallets, spare change, or other items.  The pants are made of a sturdy canvas material that is lighter than a pair of jeans, while being more resilient than a pair of slacks. The material is decently water resistant, so it can handle getting splashed without soaking up the liquid.  They would work well as work utility pants, or just fine for more casual use.

评论概述: I really like the wide legs and loose fit
评论详情: I've been looking for jeans like these for years. I really like the wide legs and loose feel.  For me the fit is perfect. The jeans are comfortable, and I like the look. Even the slightly faded, worn appearance works well for these jeans. Although advertised as baggy, they don't look sloppy at all. I ordered Large, and it seems true to size. The jeans appear to be well made also. Definitely recommended if you like wide legs.
They fit around the waist nicely but the length was running long I'm a 32, and they were 34. I can roll them up;.. but it makes it feel weird. None less i like the fit and they are ok for my style.

Jeans with a narrow waist and wide legs? Yes, please. I ordered these for myself and not my husband. The legs would be way too wide for his comfort. But they are perfect for me.  They're a little large (my fault as I should have sized down) but since the waist is fairly narrow, I can cinch the waistline with a belt and it doesn't ruin the silhouette I'm going for. Wide-legged jeans are all the rage now and it's so nice paying $30 bucks for a pair rather than double, triple the amount.  The fabric is soft, not so thick that it doesn't drape nicely and not so thin that it's unforgiving to your figure. I'm 5'8" so I love the length of the inseam. These jeans work well with chunky sneakers, boots or heels, depending on how you want to style them.

My husband grew up in the 90's when baggy skater jeans were all the rage. He wore all his until they fell apart. These jeans are VERY reminiscent of that time. They are fitted at the top (run a little small) and super wide legs all the way down. Great jeans

评论概述: Nice but a lot baggier than shown
评论详情: These are very very nice jeans. Made well, the coloring is nice and they wash well. They are very large at the bottom. I know it says baggy but the legs are very very wide. Luckily my husband doesn't mind that but if want a pair that looks more like the picture, these probably aren't for you. However they are very nice. Nice and durable and feel like they are built to last. He said they are very comfortable. They don't feel super heavy or like they are weighing him down. They have nice large pockets so he can carry everything and he said they don't feel like they are falling even if he has his phone and wallet in one pocket. Overall we are happy with them. I would still recommend them.

评论概述: REALLY Wide legs, otherwise fit nicely.
评论详情: The legs are really, really wide, much wider than I expected. Other than that, they fit nicely, although they will need to be hemmed since I’m short.  They are also very washed out looking, which I know is a plus for some people.

I ordered these for my husband to try.  He's not normally a "baggy jean" type of guy but when he tried them on he liked them.  The size was spot on and it looks comfortable and also confirmed by my husband that they definitely are very comfortable.  It is made from a good quality denim fabric and has plenty of pockets.  My hubs was very happy with them and so am I!

评论概述: Comfort and style in one wide-leg package
评论详情: As a taller female (5'8"/160/36B), I’m always checking out men’s jeans.  I was impressed by this pair of wide-leg jeans.  They fit well and, happily, are long enough.  I am unsure if I will keep them as is, or cut them down to gaucho-length for the summer months.  In any event, they are well-made, sturdy, and substantial.  The zipper works well, and the stitching is top-notch.  This is a lighter, worn-look blue denim, which I prefer.  Finally, my laundering protocol will be effortless: cold/line- or hang-dry.

I ordered these pants for my teen in size Large. The wide skater-style leg and length are both perfect on him, but the waist is really tight. It tapers in a ton at the waist. He was able to squeeze into them with a lot of effort, and large is his normal size. If you have a larger waist at all, definitely size up from what you think you need. Price seems reasonable, and the style is great.

评论概述: Waist wise fits great - baggy though for sure - NOTE - they are suppose to be baggy - I know :)
评论详情: Fits as expected, baggy for sure, but expected, waist is great and if you have larger quads and such these will fit great.

These pants are Nice and comfortable. They are true to size and color. No running or fabric pilling after first wash. No chemical smell when you open the package either. In my opinion they are overall a good value.

评论概述: Nailed the look but waist a little narrow.
评论详情: These jeans feel great. The legs are loose as expected. The waist is a bit narrow on a medium. The materials look and feel awesome. The styling of the jean material is perfect.
They fit my son great and he loves them. They are super baggy so if that's the look you're going for then they're perfect.

I recently ordered these "Men's Baggy Hip Hop Jeans Wide Leg Skater Denim Pants Casual Loose Fit Long Trousers Streetwear" because, well... pants!These jeans are exactly what I expected them to be.  Well, very close anyway.  I wear 32" jeans typically and the waist fits just fine.  They're a tad long on me, but given the style, I may just leave them as they are instead of hemming.  The wide legs are WIDE.  Like, I'm not sure I can pull them off, style-wise, but I'm giving it a go, haha!  Very comfy.  I love that these have a "pre-faded," worn kind of look - nothing bugs me like "brand new jeans" that LOOK brand new, and these are perfect in that regard.No complaints here, and for the currently posted retail price of $29.99, these seem like a reasonable value to me.
